statements: UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET preferences = '{ "category": "promotions", "frequency": "weekly" }' WHERE customer_id = '7890abcdef-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678';
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET preferences = '{"promo":true, "newsletter":false}' WHERE customer_id = 'a1b2c3'
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET email_address = 'new@example.com', customer_id = 'd4e5f6' WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference1 = 'New Preference' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_lists SET list_description = 'Updated Description', list_name = 'New Name' WHERE list_id = 5;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference1 = 'value1', preference2 = 'value2' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_lists SET list_name = 'New List Name', target_criteria = 'New Criteria' WHERE list_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_lists SET list_name = 'VIP Customers List' WHERE list_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', preferences = '{"theme": "dark"}' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_lists SET customer_id = 2 WHERE list_id = 3;
UPDATE preferences SET email='new@example.com', preference_1=TRUE WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-01-31' WHERE campaign_id=5;
UPDATE preferences SET email='new_email@example.com', preference_1=TRUE WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE campaign_results SET total_sent=1000, total_opened=800, total_clicked=200 WHERE campaign_id=3 AND list_id=5;
UPDATE preferences SET email = 'newemail@example.com', subscription_status = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE preferences SET email = 'newemail@example.com', subscription_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET location = 'New York', age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 100;
